title: A lovely resturant - dinning
text: A lovely resturant - dinning under trees keeping you cool. Service and food amazing. Everything is clean and tidy! Make use of the happy food hours!

title: Very friendly family run restaurant
text: Very friendly family run restaurant suitable for families! Food was amazing and service great even with the restrictions in place.

title: Lovely hotel
text:
Lovely hotel, really good sized rooms with plenty of room. Not much kitchen equipment and the bathrooms although recently refurbished were a bit small with large sink spaces and not much space between the shower unit (glass sliding doors) and the sink side (also glass).

The pool area is clean and plenty of beds (due to covid there wasnt many beds or guests but still more than enough). The pool bar had limited drinks in the self service fridge and limited ice creams. However there was no other food available and sadly no offer of a hot meal durning the medicane. The pool bar wasnt open at any point only so we could pay for drinks or ice cream. We werent told that the pool bar was otherwise closed as any point.

The hotel itself is situated between the main road and beach less than a 10 min walk either way.

title: Fab place
text: Fab place, remember who has been before and who uses/makes contact via their social media pages. Food and service very high. Nothing is too much trouble

title: Greated with smiles
text: Greated with smiles and covid restrictions elbow bumps! Friendly and polite staff, tasty fresh food and a relaxing atmosphere.

title: Lovely greek place
text: Lovely greek place just down the old kalamaki road towards the beach. Friendly staff, clean presentable restaurant and staff. Food was sooo tasty and the lemon chicken melted in my mouth. The only sad part of the evening was another customer shouted at the staff as there was a problem with their meal that they were trying to sort for them.

title: Fab food and service
text: Fab food and service even in the medicane we had! So much food -you dont leave hungry! Whole place and everyone respecting the restrictions in place. The restaurant very clean and well maintained.

title: Food as always is good and
text: Food as always is good and tasty. Service was quick and friendly. Another entrance/exit in place and restaurant is very clean.

title: Good food
text: Good service and food, value for money. Clean and nothing is too much trouble. Couldnt pick one dish so had a set meal but picked from a smaller selection of dishes!

title: Friendly staff - family run!
text: Friendly staff - family run! Food served most of the day of good value for money, drinks of decent prices too!

title: Tick list
text:
We pre booked our tickets and had directions on where to pick them up from however due to covid we were emailed them. This was great in the aspect we didnt have to find the collection office but not so great if you dont have the access to your emails etc.

Arrived early and found the south entrance which is closer to the metro line and museum. Steadier incline to the top with stunning views all round. Some slopes and steps so not wheelchair friendly and not great if you have walking difficulties. Not many hand rails. Due to covid one way system is in place. The views of the city from above is stunning and i didnt realise how big Athens is until i got up there and can be seen all the way round.

title: Tick list
text:
Lovely air conditioned building plenty of space to move around. Security on the door before tickets are brought etc. Underground 'city' is lovely to see.

Restaurant serves good food, we didnt go to the shops.

title: Tasty food but disappointed
text: The food was tasty but we was disappointed as i order lamb in a pot but all i got was a plate of lamb nothing with it, not even a warning thats all it was.

title: Brillant service from the start
text:
Have used Nefis before for some
smaller trips and have really enjoyed them. This year we enquired about a day trip to Athens, sadly as there wasnt enough interest and people going the trip didnt go ahead. We also arranged to do their secret senses evening trip. This was beautiful! Picked up from your resort, we went to a winery where we had a tour and tasted some lovely wine before being taken to a perfume factory and being told how they make the different scents. We then walked to a hill to see the sun setting. We was taken to a typical greek taverna where we had a greek meze (lots of small dishes) and drinks under lemon groves and the stars! Greek live music was played and Nefis owner Jackie joined us for some greek dancing and singing. We was taken back to our resort.

Everything from booking here in the uk and getting 10% discount to going on the trips is so easily done. They arrange with you to take payment on or the day after your arrival at your hotel!

title: Treated like family
text:
Welcomed with open arms from Becky and Nikos with plenty of kisses (mum got alot more from Nikos). Food was freshly prepared and cooked. Pudding was lovely too.

Plenty of choices for all. They do get busy so you can tell how many people enjoy coming here, with many people returning just like us.

We will be back again

title: Good evening drink stop
text:
Chris and his family make you feel welcome and relaxed from the moment you walk in. Plenty of drink choices, relaxed friendly place.

Didnt have food so can not comment

title: You dont leave hungry!
text: Menu with plenty of choices indian and chinese - can mix them if you want, set menus and individual dishes. Big portions, plenty of tables too.

title: Filling tasty food
text: I can not fault this place. Excellent service, filling tasty food. Typical greek music gently playing in the background. A menu with so much choice it can take you a while! It is a typical greek taverna!

title: Dissappointed this year
text: Have been here many times, however this year we were dissapointed. We went in a couple of times about 730/800ish in the evenings and there was barely anything left. Barely any cakes mostly creams.

title: Family friendly clean complex
text:
Everyone says its basic but what more do people want from a room you are going to shower and sleep in?

Welcomed with a smile and paid our room tax and for a safe. We were taken to our room, our door was a little sticky but we soon got used to this. Rooms cleaned daily and linen/towels changes regularly. Staff from cleaners, pool bar staff and handy man and mangement are willing to help you in any way they can. Rooms have a shower room, 2 ring cooker on kitcken side, plenty of cups, glasses, plates, bowls and cutlery. We only used a few of the items mostly a glass each. Kitchen area was kept clean, fridge and kettle too.

Beds were comfy and linen in good condition.

Pool and bar areas are kept clean, staff friendly. Tables cleaned quickly, food was off good value and full of flavour great for lunches and snacks which is all we had there. Pool is good size for the size of the complex and plenty of beds. When we first went nobody was reserving beds but towards the end people started doing so.

All in all we had an amazing stay and break away. We will be back

title: Fast food
text:
If you want something quick or are short on time then this is the place for you. From typical greek gyros to burgers and pizzas, there is something for almost everyone! You can see them preparing the food from the tables.

They also do take away and delivery!

title: Lovely little place
text: Not pushed to come in, was left to look at the menu and was then welcomed in and seated. Food and drink arrived in good time, lemon chicken was full of flavour and melted in the mouth just like the potatoes. Was given plenty of time to eat and drink

title: Tasty good food
text: Welcomed back with lovely greetings! Picked where we wanted to sit as we were one of the first ones there. Food was tasty and filling, they ask when you order a curry how spicy you want it. They do food that comes out sizzling and another greek dish on fire (when this dish comes out you will near tongs clanging togeather so you and the other staff know to be careful).

title: Family friendly
text: Recongised from previous visit and was welcomed back. Food and drink tasty and filling, good selection something for most people. Random greek dancing with plates smashing and fire dancing.

title: Lovely evening under the trees
text: Not pushed to come in but greeted and seated quickly. Drinks and food arrived in good time - orders are put straight to kitchen as orders are done on electric pad rather than paper. Big portions! Very busy resturant with friendly staff.

title: Lovely meals
text: As always the service from arrival until leaving is 10/10. Smiles, handshakes and kisses, plenty of tables to choose from if early enough. We made use of the free starter or pudding during the happy hour(s). Drinks offered as soon as you are seated, not pushed into quickly choosing a meal, not rushed to eat and leave. They make sure that everything is ok during your meal, plates cleared away when finished after a few minutes. Greek music quietly playing, good choice of foods and drinks. Resturant is clean and tidy, staff will do anything for you and are happy to see return visitors. Family friendly place. Greek night on a sunday i recommend booking in advance.
